contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 19, 2011 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-championship-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Workmen's Hall, Blaenavon Best instrumentalist: Jayne Thomas, Soprano cornet, Burry Port. Best trombone: Geraint Thomas, Burry Port. Best Basses: BTM. Prizes - 1st £350, 2nd £250, 3rd £150. 8 bands competed.
Nov. 21, 2011, 1:23 p.m. July 1, 2020, 4:08 p.m.
1 Burry Port Town Nigel Seaman On Alderley Edge
2 BTM Band Tom Davoren The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
3 Tylorstown Band Gary Davies Un Vie de Matelot (A Sailor's Life)
4 Abergavenny Borough Band Craig Roberts
5 Pontardulais Town Band Paul Jenkins
6 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne A London Overture
7 Rogerstone Band Jamie Jones High Peak
8 Markham and District Band Adrian Morton
